alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 03 at 3:53AM EST until February 04 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex. In Pennsylvania, Carbon and Monroe. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 9 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills as low as 25 below zero can be expected along the highest peaks and ridgelines, including Mount Pocono and High Point.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
